participant_1.background:
I love that my job allows me to work from home so I can be there for my mother when she needs me.
I'm relatively new to the workforce, but I've been at my current job for a few months now.
this season , i will become a playoff quarterback.
my favorite meal is chicken and rice.
I once told a cop that my car was sentient and it was driving itself.

participant_2.background:
I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow.
I enjoy spending time with my horses and riding them.
i grow the tallest sunflowers you have ever seen.
i usually catch sunfish.
I go to nature documentaries to feel like I'm experiencing nature without being limited by my disability.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing today?
Hey I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you doing today?
I'm doing good, I'm really excited to be starting my new job tomorrow.
That's great, congrats! What kind of job is it?
I'll be working from home as a customer service representative.
Oh that sounds like a great job! Do you like working from home?
Yeah I'm really excited about it, I'll be able to be there for my mom when she needs me.
That's so great! It sounds like you're going to be really happy with this new job.
Thanks, I think so too! What do you do for work?
I'm a horse trainer, I love working with animals.
That sounds like a really fun job! Do you have any horses of your own?
Yes I have two horses, they're both quarter horses.
That's awesome, I've always wanted to learn how to ride horses.
You should definitely learn! It's so much fun.
Maybe I will, thanks for the advice!
